data.title: MLC PASSPORT GRADUATION EDITION
data.meta_description: MLC PASSPORT GRADUATION EDITION - June 19, 2020 by Shontay Gibson | This newsletter was created with Smore, an online tool for creating beautiful newsletters for educators, businesses and more
data.text:
Seniors

Don’t forget to sign up for your free Premium KudoBoard and invite your friends and family to sign your digital yearbook! Check Schoology for the directions

Senior yearbooks are currently being processed and will be shipped directly to each student at the address we have on file. We do not have a delivery date at this time, so we appreciate your continued patience!

Link to photos will be made available on Facebook and Schoology when ready.

All families will be mailed a 5x7 of Graduation photo

Happy graduation day Rachie! Wow I can’t believe you are going to college and will be turning 18 years old! I remember when we used to record videos on Ashley’s ipad and my ipad and at the end of every video you would say “ I am recording this” and it was so funny! When you leave to go to college though I will be taking over your room in your house because your mom said I can live there (lol). Rach you are an amazing person, you are kind hearted and you always think about other people’s feelings. I am so sure a lot of people will want to be your friend in college since you are so cool. From your favorite cousin Jessica.

Happy graduation day Rachie! Wow I can’t believe you are going to college and will be turning 18 years old! I remember when we used to record videos on Ashley’s ipad and my ipad and at the end of every video you would say “ I am recording this” and it was so funny! When you leave to go to college though I will be taking over your room in your house because your mom said I can live there (lol). Rach you are an amazing person, you are kind hearted and you always think about other people’s feelings. I am so sure a lot of people will want to be your friend in college since you are so cool.

From your favorite cousin Jessica.

Congratulations dearest Tatyana on your Graduation Day!!

We are all so very proud of you , on your completion of this very important milestone in your life. Now to see you off to college, entering adulthood, but you are, and will always be Gram’s Little Gem.

You are a Visionary, with boldness, and confidence, and a help-mate to others. We are so proud of you for being the “Change You want to See in the World”. It took courage and tenacity to bring forth the Idea of a Change in Venue For MLC Graduation.. they said it couldn’t be done , but you did it!! Only the Pandemic shut you down; You developed a “Kick for Cancer“ fundraiser in honor of your mom and raised over $1500.00 which was donated to the ACS, which they said couldn’t be done; You took your Senior Project..on Cancer Awareness, and developed a program and presented it at the Simpson -Waverly School Health Fair. Helping women of color understand the importance of early preventive cancer screens......

You Did It!!

Remember to prepare, study hard, and always do your very best, wherever life takes you, and to always keep God First in Your Life!! And Remember your Manners!!

Congratulations, Taty, on a job well done!

Your Family.
